title: Asset Allocators Diversifying Dollar Exposure: Oksana Aronov
description: "On "Bloomberg Real Yield", Oksana Aronov, head of market strategy for alternative fixed income at JPMorgan Asset Management, and Jeff Sherman, deputy CIO at DoubleLine Capital, talk with Bloomberg's Scarlet Fu about the US dollar. (Source: Bloomberg)
content: "On "Bloomberg Real Yield", Oksana Aronov, head of market strategy for alternative fixed income at JPMorgan Asset Management, and Jeff Sherman, deputy CIO at DoubleLine Capital, talk with Bloomberg's Scarlet Fu about the US dollar. (Source: Bloomberg)
